rooms.description: A compact and functional living space for the staff that includes a small kitchenette, bed area, and bathroom. This room is positioned in the northeast corner as per Vastu recommendations to bring prosperity.

rooms.description: An expansive open-plan studio designed with Art Deco aesthetics featuring natural light from large windows and high ceilings. The space integrates a living area, dining area, and a well-equipped modern kitchen to ensure maximum ventilation and luxury living.

rooms.name: Private Study/Living Area
rooms.description: A dedicated room for relaxation or work, designed with elegant Art Deco detailing. It is located near the studio area to allow for seamless transitions and natural light.
